page.title: 12CLUB DAY IN LEEK
page.content: Club Day is a time when all the Sunday Schools,Cubs,Scouts Guides and Brownies gather together and walk around the town.It happens usually in the middle of July. The Clubs start off at the Maude Institute and start to walk to the Market Place.There is open air hymn singing and prayers are read out.They walk all around the town. Afterwards , there is a party and a few sport races . I have been in Club Day and I liked it. It makes your legs tired though,but the party is good. Club Day is nearly a 100 years old.Around 1810 it was known as Cap Sunday,because of the white caps worn by the girls,but later it was changed to Saturday.
